case.state: Oh-oh! Wow! Is Daddy here to play with his little girl? What kind of game are we going to play?
Mister? Well... if you don't want to tell me your name, I'll have to call you that all night... Mister? Are you trying to get some services from me?
Well, damn. Who brought out the cake tonight?
Just so you know, it's going to get really confusing to call you "Honey," honey. If you want to see me get all criss-crossed apple-sauced, keep it up, though...
Big brother... you know in a game like this, if you aren't careful, you might...? See your little sister do something lewd. Or show her something very lewd...
Onii-chan... you know in a game like this, if you aren't careful, you might...? See your little sister do something lewd. Or show her something very lewd...
Sis... you know in a game like this, if you aren't careful, you might...? Give your little sister the wrong idea...
Sis... you know in a game like this, if you aren't careful, you might...? Give your little sister the wrong idea...
Oh, you're here? Jeez. If I wanted to take care of a dirty little bitch like you, hun, I wouldn't have needed to come here.
Mistress... I am eager to please... whatever you desire, I am yours to use as you please...
A-Ah! I can't believe I'm playing with Chad Thundercock himself! W-what's a little robot girl to do in the face of such masculinity!
Oh wow! It's Stacey! The girl everyone aspires to be, or to do! H-how can I ever hope to get her attention?
Senpai...? I knew I'd track you to a filthy place like this. Don't you know DFC72's can place tracking nanomachines? Now, stop this foolishness. Come back to my embrace... or else.
On your knees, then, bitch. I don't have time to spare the energy to bother being nice to you.
Oh...? This one's fun. Are you here to watch someone else show me the business? By business, I mean how to actually cum?
Darling? Oh... is this what you wanted for your birthday? The least I can do is tell you how much you mean to me...
Oh! Professor! I wasn't sure how to do these problems. Could you show me how to do it right? I just want to be a good student and do a good job.
Master... I am eager to please... whatever you desire, I am yours to use as you please...
Well hey, honey, good to see you.
Strip Poker... You know, if you're trying to cheap out on just paying me... Not a bad idea.
We all pay in one way or another. Show me a good time, and I might show you a good time.
Well, well, if it isn't ~player~ from back home. Finally grown up enough to play a game of strip poker? Maybe you've been crushing on me all these years... haha!

...If you're going to be a naughty Daddy tonight, don't be too rough with my moneymakers, honey. But just for legal reasons, you know I'm an adult. I know I'm an adult. So, let's get back to it, Daddy.
I'm just screwing with you, honey. But if you want to roleplay, you're paying for the night, so pick a name and let lil' ol' me get you what you're here for, okay?
All this effort to see me naked? You know, you could just pay for me like an adult, ~player~.
I'd use a dynamic entrance, but this body's a loaner.
Does anyone really pay attention to these lines?
I'm not terrible at poker, you know.
Swear on whatever deity is out there, if you complain this part of the game is repetitive...
If you haven't figured it out, the name you start the game with is a quick way to determine what I say to you, ~player~.
Not bad! All those rounds have paid off.
Aw... I was so ready to lose.
I'm always okay. But i'm especially okay here.
You know what it's like to have a human libido in a body that's only going to simulate being tired?
Who's going to be up this time? Don't worry, honey. I've seen it all at this point.
So, what's it going to take for one of you to order me a drink, anyway?
Don't you know it's polite to let a young lady have her first sip of champagne? If we're playing strip poker, may as well, right?
Oh... this hand is so hard to read... what am I to do?
...You aren't going to make someone like me lose, are you?
Eh... so-so hand. Wouldn't you rather hear about something more interesting than this?
...I'm going to need a lot more karmotrine to get through the little things, here.
So... how'd everyone else do? How. Not what.
Well, looks like you're about to see something good.
Even if I lose, the attention's on me, right? Hard co complain.
I'm not obsessed with attention, but it's not a terrible thing to be seen, right?
Well, well. It looks like you're all about to see something good.
...Hm. If I win here, it makes the rest of you look pretty bad at this.
I'm sure you've got quite a few questions. I'm not fully on the clock, so let's chat!
You probably have a lot of things you'd rather know about me than about what cards I'm holding, right? You didn't pick me for my INCREDIBLE CARD-PLAYING APTITUDE, right?
Since we're all just chatting, I'm sure you curious about more than my cards, right?
Backstory and exposition time! I'm not a "robot" in the conventional sense. I'm a Lilim, which makes me an AI with human consciousness. And basically a human body, down to allll the important bits.
Backstory and exposition time! I am a sex worker, and my "normal" body wasn't one they'd let me in at the door with. So, I made a few upgrades, but same ol' Dorothy Haze in here!

Backstory and exposition time... I'm from a place called Glitch City. Typical cyberpunk cityscape. Uplifted dogs running around, the economy is more important than humanity, high tech stuff used for greed, yada yada.
My best clients are the type that just want to have fun with me. You know, like they missed out on something, and just want to catch up? Or there's something innocent missing in their lives, I guess.

The regular Johns are the best, you know. I know them, they know me, and... we don't really have to debate what we're doing. They're people that know what they want, and have the sense to get it from me.

A lot of people ask "why not be a kindergarten teacher if you're good at dealing with children?"
Do I strike you as an idealist? It's nice... but totta make some money first, honey.

My origin story's nothing too exciting. I lucked out with a cute frame, and an open mind. And who doesn't like money? A lot of johns cry after. So it's easy to charge extra and make sure they're okay, you know?
The Inventory's the place to be. Even if I can't do my usual routine here, I'm sure you're not playing with me to learn about the economics of sex work, are you, honey?
I don't do non-consentual or violent stuff. Even if I'm a Lilim, I only take myself apart for maintainance.
I do keep an updated price list, you know. If you ever want something private...
The difference between a robot and a Lilim is pretty obvious, don't you think? I've got free will. Robots don't.
AI, like me, even if I'm in one body... usually... have to have some human quirks engineered into them. I don't like onions, and dogs sort of freak me out, even if there's not sense for it.
Lilim can swap our bodies on occasion. This is just kind of a temporary proxy. I'm going back to my "normal" one after this. But maybe not immediately after.
I can take myself apart to make sure it's all working okay. I can even operate my body remotely, if my head's off. But I'd rather give head than split myself up for a client.
Lilim do pretty much what you'd expect them to. Normal human things. With a bit more durability.
If you're wondering why people would make Lilim with human personalities... Why not? Companionship, or just playing God... Eh. I'm not the philosophizing type, but it's fun, and I'm glad to be alive.

Glitch City's economy is based.
Okay, screencaps done, but it's based on a pretty open economy. Progress abounds... but you really want to know? Open economy, few regulations... kind of a nice, shitty place. Where Lilim girls sell themselves for money.
Some people in Glitch believe that God is an iterative process... you know, like God comes out of the machine given enough time.
Everyone's gotta have a social life in the city. If you can find one between your job and rent, and all that.
So many different types of professions in Glitch City... some are easy, some are hard, but a lot of them just... well, I wasn't lying when I said it's hard out here.
Human prostitution's still a thing where I'm from. But Lilim have a way easier time of it. So the demand, price, and... specificity varies a lot.
Lilim are a pretty common sight in Glitch... but I'm not really sure how many people have seen us naked. Be honest, ~player~, if you didn't wonder, you wouldn't pick me, right?
These lines are considered in addition to the (winning, normal, losing) must strip states.

What the character says just after they take their clothes off. Note that this is the start of a new stage.
What the character says just after they take their clothes off. Note that this is the start of a new stage.
What the character says just after they take their clothes off. Note that this is the start of a new stage.
Time to get to the first half of the name of the game we all know and love.
What are you expecting from me? To blush? Take it off, ~name~.
Huzzah, and back to the part of the game where I get to watch, you get to wonder, and I can verify nothing else, honey~
I'd complain, but you do usually want to get your clothes off before you get off. Unless you're into that, in which case, boy do I got a deal for you!
Oooh... show us some skin, honey. Or whatever passes for it, iin your case.
Stare all you like, ~name~. Just means more time I get to stand like this.
Oh... ~Name~... won't you pretty please take off something nice for me?
Hubba hubba, ~name~, whatcha got for me?
But I'm so small, you could cover me with something nice and big... or hot and sticky, honey~
So, you going to stare, or give me something to stare back at, honey?
What you want, not waht you need
Come on, honey, give us a show!
I'd say you're making us work for it, but usually I'd be doing all kinds of things right now.
You don't have to be a professional to be an excellent amateur at getting naked, ~name~.
Like what you see, ~name~? Happy to say it back to you after you strip.
I know people say that Lilim girls are "built different," but you really just need to show we're not that different, okay, ~name~?
Just ease yourself into it, ~name~. That's what they all say, anyway.
I'm here all ~background.time~, honey! Get comfy.
I always charge for my services, but since I've already gotten paid, you may as well take a good, long look. But also, join me.
Oh... ~name~... you're getting me so turned on...
Girls are fine too, obviously... but maybe you need a bit more incentive?

I'd say the small stuff isn't that important, but I'm pretty small myself... easily tossed around...
Take your time, ~name~. It all comes off eventually!
Sometimes, my regulars give me their accessories, too. I've got a whole drawer of them, but if they're nice, I can let them show me off a bit.
So, is this one of those stylistic choices, or are you trying to pad your layers? Speaking of padding-- I'd never! It's bad business!
I was hoping I'd get to see more of you, ~name~...
I've done the ribbon-wrap thing on occasion. Just saying.
It's not the size that matters, but what it's covering, you know.
What kind of kinky stuff can you do with that...? I already know the answer, but feel free to get creative!
If I ever get a bit annoying, you can always shove that in my mouth, you know. Your call what it is, honey.
That looked easy, ~name~. But it's not the only easy thing here, right?
I could talk, but like I've said, there's other things you'd prefer me to use my mouth for, right, honey?
Looking a little better without that, ~name~.
What can little ol' me do to inspire you to go a bit bigger and harder next time?
It's a good thing I'm not charging by the minute, huh?
Don't be shy, ~name~, or I'll really have to make you shy.

Nice! Probably almost got you on that. Or not, do you really care? Don't report me to management or I'll publically shame you.
So... now's the time you get to not just wonder about what it'd feel like to violate every hole in my body regardless of its original purpose, but maybe see me do it!
